name: MMA Federation
blurb: Bruce Buffer's all-new social game based in the world of MMA, introducing Real Achievements, Real Teams and Real Fighters!

rewards.reward: MMA Supporter\r\n==========================\r\nThank you! You'll receive Kickstarter Backer Updates (digital) as your reward, as well as having access to the game one week ahead of the general public at the end of 2014. Your support of MMA Federation helps get us one step closer to making this innovative game concept a reality!

MMA Backer ========================== Kickstarter Backer Updates PLUS you'll receive VIP access to the MMA Federation Forums, giving you the option to view exclusive content of the game while it's in development and feed back live to the Developers. We need your input. You'll also get early BETA Access to the game, 3 months ahead of the public! You'll also receive \u00a36 worth of In-Game Currency.

MMA Fan\r\n==========================\r\nKickstarter Backer Updates PLUS you'll receive VIP access to the MMA Federation Forums, giving you the option to view exclusive content of the game while it's in development and feed back live to the Developers. We need your input.  You'll also get early BETA Access to the game, 3 months ahead of the public! You'll also receive \u00a315 worth of In-Game Currency as well as receiving a 'Special Thanks' Credit in the game!

MMA Fighter\r\n==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + VIP Status Badge In-Game, helping you stand out from the millions of other players! Exclusive access to Backers-only In-Game Tournaments, AND an additional \u00a315 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a330 total!)

Rookie\r\n==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + Exclusive In-Game Item, only available to Kickstarter Backers, Exclusive MMA Federation T-Shirt, AND an additional \u00a330 worth of In-Game Currency \u00a3100 total!)

Rising Star\r\n==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + a Personalized 'Bruce Buffer Ringtone' for your Phone (digital - we'll send you an MP3 File)! PLUS Exclusive MMA Federation Hoodie! AND an additional \u00a340 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a3100 total!)

Contender\r\n==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + Personalized Signed copy of 'It's Time: My 360 Degree View of the UFC' by Bruce Buffer! AND an additional \u00a350 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a3150 total!)

Champion\r\n==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + Exclusive Fight Gym Poster Signed by the Fighters (choose from any Team!) AND Official Fight Gym T-Shirt also Signed by Fighters (choose from any Team!)  AND an additional \u00a350 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a3200 total!)

Undisputed Champion\r\n==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + a Pair of Limited Edition MMA Gloves Signed by ANY Fighter,  as well as giving you an 'Associate Producer' Credit in the game and the opportunity to attend a Production Meeting with our Team! AND an additional \u00a3100 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a3300 total!)

MMA Veteran ========================== EVERYTHING ABOVE + Two tickets to an Event of your choice PLUS walk out with your Team and Fighter in the Arena PLUS two official walkout T-Shirts (Choice of Events around the world - travel not included) AND an additional \u00a3130 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a3430 total!)

Legend ==========================\r\nEVERYTHING ABOVE + The Ultimate VIP UFC Weekend Experience - We'll put you up in a hotel for 2 nights, take in the Live Event, and then meet Bruce Buffer for a drink! (Choice of Events around the world - travel not included) AND an additional \u00a3200 worth of In-Game Currency (\u00a3500 total!)
